thread.title: Attention Referral Partners: CCPlus Boosting Managed IT Support Membership by Giving Away Laptop for Any New Client Signing Up during September 2015
thread.title_full: Attention Referral Partners: CCPlus Boosting Managed IT Support Membership by Giving Away Laptop for Any New Client Signing Up during September 2015

author: Brian Clark
title: Attention Referral Partners: CCPlus Boosting Managed IT Support Membership by Giving Away Laptop for Any New Client Signing Up during September 2015
text:
CCPlus, a managed services provider (MSP) offering business IT systems for SMBs in many industries, including dental and medical, today announced the company is giving away a free laptop valued at $499 to its referral partners for any referral that becomes a CCPlus client during September 2015. The monthly promotion is an additional perk to the usual referral bonus CCPlus referral partners earn when a referred new client signs up for a long-term IT Support Plan. The laptop giveaway ends September 30, 2015. “Our clients get paid to refer new clients to us,” said Brian Clark, president, CCPlus. “The reward comes in either the payment of a free laptop or $500 cash or both, depending on what the new client referred to us signs up for. Our Referral Partner Program and promotions allow us an opportunity to introduce our outsourced, innovative and powerful IT solutions to a greater audience. It also gives us a chance to help those businesses become more productive and focus on running their businesses.”
To learn more about CCPlus and its Referral Partner Program and monthly promotions, please visit https://www.ccplus-usa.com or call 585.697.0649.
About CCPlus
CCPlus is a managed IT service provider (MSP) with offices throughout upstate New York, including Rochester, Buffalo, Syracuse and Albany. The company manages hardware, software, networks, printers, phone systems, and more, for small and medium businesses in many industries, including dental and medical. Some IT services include increased security, HIPAA compliance solutions, data and backup recovery, cloud computing, IT consulting, and more. CCPlus http://www.ccplus-usa.com . 585.697.0649. Also, to get the latest industry news and trends, go to http://www.ccplus-usa.com/blog/ .
